Serve¶

serve¶

serve [OPTIONS] [INPUT_PATHS]...

Options

-h, --host <host>¶

Host to serve from

Default

0.0.0.0

-p, --port <port>¶

Port to serve from

Default

8000

Arguments

INPUT_PATHS¶

Optional argument(s)
